snippet: The doctor, an expert in robotics and minimally invasive surgery, used a camera disguised as a pen to shoot the video in the Union Square station, prosecutors said.
abstract: The doctor, an expert in robotics and minimally invasive surgery, used a camera disguised as a pen to shoot the video in the Union Square station, prosecutors said.

headline.main: Urologist Charged With Shooting Video Up Skirt in Subway
headline.print_headline: Doctor Accused of Recording Video Up Skirt in the Subway
